original_text: And it shall be on Aaron when he ministers, and its sound shall be heard when he goes into the Holy Place before the Lord, and when he comes out, so that he does not die.
korean_text: 아론이 입고 여호와를 섬기러 성소에 들어갈 때와 성소에서 나올 때에 그 소리가 들릴 것이라 그리하면 그가 죽지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: And it shall be on Aaron when he ministers
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 아론이 섬길 때 그에게 있을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and its sound shall be heard
when he goes into the Holy Place before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 주 앞 성소에 들어갈 때에

sentences.original_text: so that he does not die
